name: Adjust charge parameters near the end
IF (SP > 8500 && SOC > 89% && < 93) THEN SP = 9000W
IF (SOC == 100% && SP > 999) THEN  SP = 1200

name: Batt Mode
IF (SP > 6000 && SOC => 93% && < 96%) THEN SP = 7000W
IF (SP > 8000 && SOC => 97.5%) THEN SP = 8000W
IF SOC < 11% && SOC decreasing && IDLE THEN INCREASE SetPoint
